description: With eventlet the 'raise' in the neutron API might not raise the exception that we were expecting and could actually throw and error
title: Exception raised in neutron API code may not work well with eventlet

comments.content: With eventlet the 'raise' in the netutron API might not raise the exception that we were expecting abd could actually throw and error
